Package com.redis.foundation.io

Class JSONUtil

java.lang.Object
com.redis.foundation.io.JSONUtil
public class JSONUtil extends Object
The JSONUtil class provides a collection of utility methods that aid in the generation and consumption of an JSON streams.
Since:
1.0
Author:
Al Cole
